headline: TD Cowen Initiates Norwegian Cruise Line (NCLH) With Buy rating, $31 PT
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NYSE:NCLH) is one of the most undervalued stocks to buy and hold for 3 years. On July 22, TD Cowen initiated coverage of Norwegian Cruise Line with a Buy rating and a $31 price target. The firm believes that cruise lines are an underappreciated segment of the travel industry. TD Cowen […]

headline: CCL vs. NCLH: Which Cruise Stock is the Better Buy Now?
summary: Carnival rides on strong bookings, margin gains and earnings momentum, while Norwegian Cruise trails with softer growth and cost pressures.
